measured_by: instruction-screen dwell time (is_dwell) recorded with eye-tracking
justification: "Here, we use dwell time as a proxy for language processing effort (is_dwell) … the is_dwell measure evaluates how long the listeners exert effort when visually processing the objects on the instruction screen"

measured_by: feedback-screen dwell time (fs_dwell) recorded with eye-tracking
justification: "The fs_dwell measure provides a more objective measure of perspective taking … this measure served as a proxy for how much cognitive effort listeners exerted to consider the pseudo-confederate's objects on the feedback screen"

measured_by: x-flips (number of horizontal reversals in mouse trajectory)
justification: "X-flips consist of the number of reversals in direction of the mouse movement along the horizontal axis; they provide a measure of indecision and hesitation"
"Maximum deviation characterizes how much a trajectory deviates from the ideal, straight-line path … measuring cognitive pull or competition between the response options"

"Action dynamics, which were evaluated via measurement of mouse-cursor trajectories and perspective-taking effort, would reveal differences in underlying decision-making complexity (i.e., indecision and cognitive pull)"
